homepage.header.subtitle.message: A Carpet mod (fabric-carpet) extension, includes some interesting extensions

homepage.feature.carpet.description.message: REMS-Carpet-Addition transplanted a lot of old version features,giving the new version a second life

homepage.feature.vanilla.description.message: REMS-Carpet-Addition never changes the vanilla behavior unless explicitly configured by the user. Keep Minecraft vanilla

homepage.feature.compatible.description.message: Hardly any conflict with other mods
